entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as the one who has already got an owl, and his face has turned brighter scarlet than his badge.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is described as the one who is kissing Ron all over his face, and she mentions giving Percy an owl.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned by Mrs. Weasley as having already received an owl from her.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is described as looking sour and regretful about the generosity of buying Ron dress robes.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is mentioned by Mrs. Weasley as a rat that Ron used to like.

entities.name: charlie's old cauldron
entities.description: Charlie's old cauldron is described as rusting through, and Mrs. Weasley suggests replacing it with a new one.

relationships.description: Mrs. Weasley is kissing Ron all over his face, as described in the text.
Mrs. Weasley mentions giving Percy an owl from her.
Ron is described as receiving a reward from Mrs. Weasley, which includes dress robes and other items.
